tool.name: Step 14: Pvisual
tool.description: Placement Visualization of reads on a phylogenetic tree

param.name: pfile
param.label: Placement file(.jplace)
param.help: This is the file generated by the pplacer tool

param.name: str
param.label: Common string
param.help: A character, or string of characters, that all reads contain.The only condition is that all reads contain this -it will be used to find read instances within the placement section in the JPLACE_FILE.

param.name: format
param.label: Data format
param.help: The file format in which you intend to visualize the data

param.name: Scale_BLOB
param.label: Scale BLOB
param.help: A positive real value. 1: default scale; less than 1: reduce blob size; more than 1: augment blob size

param.name: Scale_TIPID
param.label: Scale_TIPID
param.help: A positive real value. 1: default scale; less than 1: reduce tip label size; more than 1: augment tip label size
